findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The smart contract owner can add or remove minter, and the minter can mint more tokens to increase the total supply.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script.

findings.title: Rebase function can be exploited for unlimited token creation
findings.description: The Rebase function allows the minter to increase the total supply of tokens, which can be exploited by the smart contract owner who has the privilege to add or remove minters.
